thread.title: TalkTalk share prices drop almost 11pc as Metropolitan Police investigation continues
thread.title_full: TalkTalk share prices drop almost 11pc as Metropolitan Police investigation continues

author: Madhumita Murgia
title: TalkTalk share prices drop almost 11pc as Metropolitan Police investigation continues
text: Internet Security TalkTalk share prices drop almost 11pc as Metropolitan Police investigation continues The telecoms company was the victim of a massive cyberattack, during which the bank details of customers were potentially stolen The Met police are investigating a "significant and sustained cyber attack" on the TalkTalk website Photo: PA
